name: BedConnect
0:
”Alexa, set "Bed Name" position to one”
”Alexa, turn light on on "Bed Name"”
”Alexa, turn massage on on "Bed Name"”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Use Alexa to adjust your LINAK Skill-powered comfort bed. This Skill supports beds with advanced LINAK systems like TD4- or TD5 Advanced, LA18 or the CBD6DC Control box. The Skill requires a Wi-Fi box (WiFi2LIN011) to connect the bed to the internet.

Features available via the Bed Connect Skill:

- Control up to four favorite positions of your LINAK powered bed (set in the Bed Connect app).
- Turn Under Bed Light ON and OFF (if supported by your bed system).
- Turn massage ON and OFF (if supported by your bed system).
